    • Method Detail

      • handleUserInput

        public void handleUserInput​(java.lang.String input)
                     throws ExitProgram
        Split the user input on a space and handle it accordingly. - If the input is valid, take the corresponding action via the controller - If the input is invalid, show a message to the user and print the help menu.
        Overrides:
        handleUserInput in class GoTUI
        Parameters:
        input - The user input.
        Throws:
        ExitProgram - When the user has indicated to exit the program.

        Prints the help menu with available input options.
